english.segment1: Been a long time since-uh God made man. Had a long line of descendants planned. Adam begat SEth, who begat Enosh, who begat Cainan. Who begat Maheleel. Who begat jared, who begat Enoch. Who had Methuselah who lived a life the longest time. Lamech had Noah, had Shem, had Arphaxad. He begat Cainin, who had Shelah, and he had. Heber, Peleg, Reu Serug, Nahor, Terah. Abraham, Isaac and Jacob. Judah, Perez, Hezron, Ram, Admin*. Amminadab, Nahshon, Salmon, Boaz, Obed, Jesse and David. SPOKEN: Let's turn the Page and Plant the family tree. Come on with John, Paul, Jonah, Peter, Moses and me. We'll go from Adam to Jesus, a genealogy. We'll spend a long, cool time there in Luke chapter three. Nathan, Mattaha, Menna, Melea. Eliakim, Jonam, Joseph and Judah. Ooh, Simeon, Levi, Matthat, Jorim, eliezer. Joshua, Er, Elmadam, Cosam- Awesome!. Addi, Melchi, Neri, Shealtiel. Zerubbabel, Rhesa, Joanan, Joda, Josech, Semein. Matthias, Maath, and Naggai. Hesli, Nahum, Amos, Hey!. Ooh yeah, ooh yeah. Ooh yeah, ooh yeah. Matthias, Joseph, Jannai. Melchi, Levi, Matthat, Eli Joseph and Jesus Christ!.
